items.name: A Gentle Nod To Welcome Visitors
items.desc:
This is our garden,
both of us just visiting.
Buds, and fresh new growth.
9.0% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Smooth orange juice and pulped mango, leading to sticky marmalade with some honey notes coming through
Body: Seriously full-bodied and sweet with a thick, fruit juice character
Aftertaste: Lingering flavour of marmalade without the zest, backed up by peppery notes and a dank hop character
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: All Together IPA
items.desc:
This is our own version of the worldwide collaboration hosted by Other Half, Stout Collective and Craftpeak to support the hospitality industry during the COVID-19 pandemic.
It's a juicy IPA brewed with Citra, Mosaic, Simcoe and Cascade, with 100% of profits from its sale being donated to organisations supporting hospitality workers.
Keep an eye out for versions from over 500 breweries worldwide all working to help others in need. Visit alltogether.beer for all the details and a list of breweries involved.
6.0% ABV 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Back On Boogie St
items.desc:
In the early 70s, while Chuck Zimmerman was in heated discussions over the rights to Columbus, or Tomahawk (to use its trademark name), another Zimmerman by the name of Tucker released Ten Songs. Years later, in the early 2000s, by which time Columbus had firmly established itself as a favourite hop used to add backbone and bitterness to APAs and Pale Ales, Ten New Songs, a masterful album by Leonard Cohen was released.Columbus isn’t new, and may no longer occupy a prime position, but like those classic records of days gone, that don’t make it junk.
6.0% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Gently swirl the glass and inhale both quickly and deeply through your nose. Take several mouthfuls, swirl in your mouth, taste and experience the smell upon exhalation
Body: Evaluate the texture of the beer in the mouth, the thickness, carbonation, and smoothness as you swallow
Aftertaste: Note lingering flavours and sensations in the mouth after drinking
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Bird Tweets Trump Trump Tweets
items.desc:
Crop Year 2019 DDH Pale hopped with Chinook, Idaho 7, Citra & Columbus.
5.0% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Gently swirl the glass and inhale both quickly and deeply through your nose. Take several mouthfuls, swirl in your mouth, taste and experience the smell upon exhalation
Body: Evaluate the texture of the beer in the mouth, the thickness, carbonation, and smoothness as you swallow
Aftertaste: Note lingering flavours and sensations in the mouth after drinking
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Crop Year 2019 4 Pack
items.desc:
This four-pack is a joyous celebration of some of our favourite, hand selected Crop Year 2019 hops.
We've poured a significant amount of our passion, expertise and time into selecting hops that will excite, delight and occasionally surprise you. It makes us proud to be able to share them with you in this way.
These latest releases from our Crop Year 2019 series represent a departure from their predecessors. Rather than focusing on a single hop, they showcase blends of some varietals from the most recent crop, tailored to suit a quartet of different styles.
We'll also be hosting a live stream to accompany this pack next Thursday (July 2nd), so you'll receive an email after purchase giving you details on how to join. Our founder Paul Jones will talk through the four beers and the hop selection process, giving you insight into the process and answering any burning questions you may have.
This pack includes the following four beers:
1 x Our Highs, Their Lows 5% - Crop Year 2019 Pilsner hopped with hand-selected Centennial, Loral & Columbus (440ml can)
1 x Land Of Landings, 6% - Crop Year 2019 Double Dry Hopped IPA, hopped with hand-selected Simcoe, Mosaic, El Dorado & Columbus (440ml can)
1 x Friends In Small Places, 8% - Crop Year 2019 Double IPA, hopped with hand-selected Citra, Amarillo & Sabro (440ml can)
1 x Bird Tweets Trump Trump Tweets, 5% - Crop Year 2019 Double Dry Hopped Pale, hopped with hand-selected Chinook, Idaho 7, Citra & Columbus  (440ml can)
**THIS PACK IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNTS AS IT'S ALREADY DISCOUNTED**

items.name: DDH Pale
items.desc:
Our Double Dry Hopped Pale is brewed to soup up your downtime by delivering the hop flavour intensity of our DIPAs at a moderate ABV. Doubling our standard Pale Ale's 8g/L dry-hopping rate to 16g/L delivers a bold, juicy, hazy, and intensely aromatic beer. Out of our hoppy beer range, this sets the marker for balance between drinkability and flavour impact.
5% ABV 440ML
Aroma & Flavour: Juicy tangerine and zesty grapefruit, soft white peach and resinous hop notes
Body: Medium-bodied and velvety with soft carbonation
Aftertaste: Lingering juicy orange and peach with a light, peppery bitterness
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
Want a discounted 6 pack? Click here

items.name: DIPA Selection 6 Pack
items.desc:
Get a proper flavour of Cloudwater's higher ABV offerings with this selection pack showcasing our current Double IPA offerings.
This pack includes the following two beers:
3 x The Light Grey One, 8% - Bold and flavoursome, hopped with Citra and Nelson Sauvin. (440ml cans)
3 x Friends In Small Spaces, 8% - Big & Juicy DIPA, hopped with Crop Year 2019 Citra, Amarillo and Sabro. (440ml cans)
**THIS PACK IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNTS AS IT'S ALREADY DISCOUNTED**

items.desc:
Crop Year 2019 DIPA hopped with Citra, Amarillo & Sabro.
8.0% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Gently swirl the glass and inhale both quickly and deeply through your nose. Take several mouthfuls, swirl in your mouth, taste and experience the smell upon exhalation
Body: Evaluate the texture of the beer in the mouth, the thickness, carbonation, and smoothness as you swallow
Aftertaste: Note lingering flavours and sensations in the mouth after drinking
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Just The Right Shape
items.desc:
For many people, the past few months have shattered norms, leaving only fragments of our previous lives.With some patience and with something beautiful in mind we can align these fragments into something delightful.
With time and a small change in perspective, there aren’t just broken pieces in front of us, but also building blocks. In time, just the right shape will reveal itself.
6.0% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Gently swirl the glass and inhale both quickly and deeply through your nose. Take several mouthfuls, swirl in your mouth, taste and experience the smell upon exhalation
Body: Evaluate the texture of the beer in the mouth, the thickness, carbonation, and smoothness as you swallow
Aftertaste: Note lingering flavours and sensations in the mouth after drinking
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: La Deuxième Saison Des Poires
items.desc:
Brewed with our friends from After The Harvest and Oliver's, this beer-perry hybrid is crisp, vibrant and thirst-quenching, finding harmony between classic perry flavours, yeast aromatics and hop notes. It was created by blending beer wort with pear juice and fermenting with a Saison yeast, before ageing in foudre for 10 months. A light Simcoe dry hop was then added prior to bottling.
ALC 5.4% VOL 750ML
Aroma & Flavour: Sweet pineapple and fresh green pear, accompanied by light lemony sourness and underpinned by light cereal malt character
Body: Light-bodied, crisp and dry with prickly carbonation
Aftertaste: Spice and doughy white bread mingle with pine and herbal hop notes
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Land Of Landings
items.desc:
Crop Year 2019 DDH IPA hopped with Simcoe, Mosaic, El Dorado & Columbus.
6.0% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Gently swirl the glass and inhale both quickly and deeply through your nose. Take several mouthfuls, swirl in your mouth, taste and experience the smell upon exhalation
Body: Evaluate the texture of the beer in the mouth, the thickness, carbonation, and smoothness as you swallow
Aftertaste: Note lingering flavours and sensations in the mouth after drinking
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Only A Dream Can Kill A Dream
items.summary: Fresh, Funky Barrel-fermented Pale with Tropical Fruits
items.desc:
Fresh, Funky Pale Ale full of tropical fruit salad flavours.
Racked onto the remaining lees in first-use French natural red wine barrels, this Pale first developed delicate funky notes and a refreshing, dry finish. Refermentation on passion fruit, pineapple and mango created a succulent, yet zippy, tropical punch bowl of flavours. Waking up from 400 years of slumber, we can summon the energy of a great man, that had a great dream. Best served chilled, and following a period of service to others less privileged.
ALC 5.9% VOL 750ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Our Highs, Their Lows
items.desc:
Crop Year 2019 Pilsner hopped with Centennial, Loral and Columbus.
5.0% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Gently swirl the glass and inhale both quickly and deeply through your nose. Take several mouthfuls, swirl in your mouth, taste and experience the smell upon exhalation
Body: Evaluate the texture of the beer in the mouth, the thickness, carbonation, and smoothness as you swallow
Aftertaste: Note lingering flavours and sensations in the mouth after drinking
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Pale Ale
items.desc:
Our Pale Ale is a beer for everyday moments, whether it's conversation with friends or quiet relaxation after work, and aims to provide balance between bold flavour and easy drinkability. It's full of rounded tropical fruit flavours with a soft, juicy finish and low bitterness.
3.7% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Mango, pineapple and tangerine, with a light, lasting malt character
Body: Light to medium body with spritzy carbonation
Aftertaste: Soft and juicy orange, low bitterness
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
Want a discounted 6 pack? Click here

items.name: Ponderosa Pines On Rainier
items.desc:
Released in the early 70s, Cascade hops, named after the California to British Columbia mountain range, became a staple in new US beer styles, such as the American Pale Ale. Often overlooked by modern breweries, it’s a hop that once was, and still is, revered for its grapefruit and pine aromas. Take it on as you would a short history lesson, and though its modern setting in this beer is far removed from the original beers it took centre stage in, enjoy it as a looking-glass back into the pioneering trailblazers that came before us.
6.0% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Gently swirl the glass and inhale both quickly and deeply through your nose. Take several mouthfuls, swirl in your mouth, taste and experience the smell upon exhalation
Body: Evaluate the texture of the beer in the mouth, the thickness, carbonation, and smoothness as you swallow
Aftertaste: Note lingering flavours and sensations in the mouth after drinking
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Singel Hopped IPA
items.desc:
One of the newest hops on our contracts, Strata delivers a unique aroma combination that wouldn’t be out of place at a tropical fruit juice bar in Amsterdam. It’ll add depth and character in the mix with other hops, but it stands proud in this single-hopped IPA. Take a moment to inhale properly, and alter your experience one sip at a time.
6.0% ABV 440ml
Aroma & Flavour: Gently swirl the glass and inhale both quickly and deeply through your nose. Take several mouthfuls, swirl in your mouth, taste and experience the smell upon exhalation
Body: Evaluate the texture of the beer in the mouth, the thickness, carbonation, and smoothness as you swallow
Aftertaste: Note lingering flavours and sensations in the mouth after drinking
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: Special Release Selection 8 Pack
items.desc:
Get a proper flavour of Cloudwater with this selection pack showcasing some of our special release beers.
All of our special release beers are designed to provide a slightly different representation of our house style and our wider approach to brewing. We experiment with processes, some of which provide light bulb moments for us and improve future beers across the board!
They provide a wide range of flavours and experiences, bringing together our wealth of brewing and drinking experience and a respect for classic styles with a thoroughly modern, flavour-first approach.
This pack includes the following eight beers:
1 x Ponderosa Pines On Rainier, 6% - Crop Year 2019 Cascade single-hopped IPA (440ml can)
1 x Just The Right Shape, 6% - Crop Year 2019 Mosaic single-hopped IPA (440ml can)
1 x Back On Boogie St, 6% - Crop Year 2019 Columbus single-hopped IPA (440ml can)
1 x Singel Hopped IPA, 6% - Crop Year 2019 Strata single-hopped IPA (440ml can)
2 x All Together IPA, 6% - This is own version of the worldwide collaboration hosted by Other Half, Stout Collective and Craftpeak to support the hospitality industry during the COVID-19 pandemic. It's a juicy IPA brewed with Citra, Mosaic, Simcoe and Cascade, with 100% of profits from its sale being donated to organisations supporting hospitality workers (440ml can)
1 x Edge Of The Bread, 6% - A double dry-hopped IPA, with Citra, Idaho 7 & Galaxy (440ml can)
1 x A Gentle Nod To Welcome Visitors, 9% - A modern, heavily hopped Barley Wine (440ml can)
**THIS PACK IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNTS AS IT'S ALREADY DISCOUNTED**

items.name: Speyside Persistence Is Utile
items.summary: Speyside BA Stout w/ Coffee & Vanilla
items.desc:
Speyside Barrel-Aged Imperial Stout conditioned on vanilla beans and single-origin Peruvian coffee beans from Workshop Coffee.
The base beer in this bottle was brewed in days we considered normal. We're releasing this beer now in difficult times, but our intentions, and our care for your experience haven't changed.
We hope you will find the time for yourself to enjoy this infusion of a rich base beer with both fine coffee and Speyside whisky, and to relax into the sense that everything is going to be OK.
10% ABV 375ml Bottle
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: That Which You Earn For
items.desc:
The green, open spaces we see in marketing campaigns obscure human effects on agricultural lands and microbial, plant, insect and animal life. Though the results of conventional hop farming are delicious, we must ask ourselves why organics are premium, and why conventional, sprayed hops are the norm.
The system is broken...
Single Hopped Mosaic IPA.
6% ABV 440ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: That Which You Earn/Yearn For 4 Pack
items.desc:
Join us in a side-by-side experiment focused on our delicious hops.
These two beers are almost identical but have one subtle difference. One is hopped with standard Mosaic, and one with an organic variant of the hop.
This pack includes the following four beers:
2 x That Which You Yearn For, 6% - Organic Mosaic single-hopped IPA (440ml can)
2 x That Which You Earn For, 6% - Mosaic single-hopped IPA (440ml can)
6% ABV 440ML x 4
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS
**THIS PACK IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR DISCOUNTS AS IT'S ALREADY DISCOUNTED**

items.name: That Which You Yearn For
items.desc:
The green, open spaces we yearn for, where nature takes its course, and human intervention is low and humble, have been reduced by agribusiness to premium offerings. The organic Mosaic hops in this IPA are handled as we imagine all hops are handled, treated as we imagine all hops are treated.
Single Hopped Organic Mosaic IPA.
6% ABV 440ML
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: The Edge Of The Bread
items.desc:
DDH IPA w/ Citra, Idaho 7 and Galaxy
6.0% ABV 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: The Light Grey One
items.desc:
Nelson & Citra DIPA.
Both legs together,
The click, click of sixteen nails.
Warm pads on cold stone.
8% ABV 440ml
ALLERGENS: GLUTEN WHEAT BARLEY OATS

items.name: The Seed Which Cannot Be Sown
items.desc:
Single hopped Triple IPA with 30 g/l of Simcoe.
11% ABV 440ML
